pages.text: Many find themselves having difficulties managing massive amounts of chests. Many seek to simply reinforce their chests, but this can get very expensive. The alchemical chests offers an arguably less expensive solution to this problem, and a unique bonus.

Not only does this chest have a whopping 104 slots, it also seems to gain special abilities when certain items are put inside. Items that have this functionality have it listed in their respective entries.

All of this is well and good, but improvements can be made. Weaving some magical textiles together around an alchemical chest, along with some covalence dust and shulker shells, creates a curious pouch. This pouch retains all of the features of its chest form, along with a new one: privacy. Each individual who reaches into the bag is presented with a different inventory. Dying the bag changes the inventory presented, and bags of the same hue sync with each other.
